divs: Sighting DetailsWas talking on the phone to a friend when i looked to the northern horizon and saw what looked to be a plane in the distance other than it was cloudy and it was flying very low the closer it got the more i realized it was not a plane or a helicopter and as it approached to fly directly over my house i saw two blue lights shot from both sides of the craft in opposite directions and disappeared then after i saw that and it was directly about my head i saw the shape in perfect detail that it was a dark or black color and was in a perfect sphere shape and the craft had an amber colored light (just one singular light and was not blinking it was a continuous light) the flight path from beginning of sighting to that last know direction was due south the changed coarse to south southeast then changed coarse back to directly south after its last coarse change to south it shot out of sight with extreme acceleration and speed. The feelings i had during the sighting was at first didn't think much of it then as i could make out that it was a normal plane or helicopter i started to feel excited at first then felt a feeling of fear because it was right above my house moving at a very slow rate of speed the whole time was watching it the feelings after the event I feel very confused and don't understand what i could have seen other then a UFO because conventional aircraft this thing was not
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Lincoln
There were no other sightings in Lincoln on or around February 17th 2011
Summary: sphere shaped object with an consistent not blinking amber light silent while seen and flown over head then moved at great speed
